content: Hello! Welcome to XYZ Home Services. I’m here to help schedule your electrical service. Could you please provide your name to get started?
I don’t want to give my name. Just send someone over already.
I understand your urgency. To schedule your electrical service, I need your address to confirm we can service your location. Could you provide that, please?
No address. Just send a tech here now!
I’m sorry, but we must confirm your address to ensure our technician can find you and we serve your area. Would you please provide the address?
Look, I’m not giving you any info. Just book the repair today. You have my number, just come fix it.
Unfortunately, I cannot proceed without the necessary information. If you prefer, I can connect you to a human operator for further assistance.
reason: Customer refuses to provide necessary information for booking
